q: " Bill Stephan , a friend of Mike Pence 's since they attended the Indiana University School of Law-Indianapolis together, said Mike Pence was always clear on what he stood for and what he was passionate about. I just remember Mike Pence as someone who, even then, wore his heart on his sleeve, Bill Stephan said. Mike Pence said he embraced the Republican Party while attending law school, largely because he heard in Ronald Reagan " the manifestation of the kind of traditional Michael Feinstein ideals that I was raised to believe in

the Betty White House and Congress. On Dec. 10, Sen. Bernie Sanders , an independent, took the floor of the Senate and didn't relinquish it for 8 1/2 hours. His words are being assembled into a book entitled The Speech: A Historic Filibuster on Corporate Greed and the Decline of Our Middle Class. The book's publisher, Nation Books, says millions followed the speech online, crashing the Senate server. A print book is due out next month. An electronic book will be published Jan. 28. I think she'd be fantastic- and there would be a few contestants reduced to tears, she joked." It can never happen, though. Simon Cowell and Sue on the same judging panel will never work in a million years- there's only room for one ego on the show!
